author: sussman
msg: Fufill part of issue #896: log messages now always enter the
repository as UTF8 and LF line endings.  When being displayed, convert
to native locale and native line endings.
Note that svnadmin and svnlook aren't obeying this new law yet:  but
they will soon in a separate change.  (We need to move the
eol-translation stuff out of libsvn_wc first.)
* cmdline/util.c
(svn_cl__get_log_message): if a log message comes in via baton, then
after converting to UTF8, convert to LF line endings too.
(svn_cl__edit_externally): after converting log message to UTF8,
convert to LF line endings too.
* cmdline/log-cmd.c
(log_message_receiver, log_message_receiver_xml): before printing,
convert log message from LF to native line endings.
* svn_client.h
(svn_client_get_commit_log_t): tweak docs.  remind the implementor
of this prototype that log messages must enter libsvn_client as UTF8
with LF line-endings.

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c
(dav_svn__update_report): The return type of the function is
dav_error *, not svn_error_t *.  SVN_NO_ERROR is not a dav_error *,
so return NULL rather than SVN_NO_ERROR when there is no error.  The
old implementation works, but the new is both more correct and
consistent.

author: kfogel
msg: Resolve issue #994:
* subversion/libsvn_subr/validate.c
(svn_mime_type_is_binary): Treat "image/x-xbitmap" as a text type.
Suggested by: Colin Watson <cjwatson@flatline.org.uk>
Also, update all comments referring to the old behavior.

author: xsteve
msg: * Added new keyboard shortcut: s - svn-status-show-process-buffer
* Added some emacs20 compatibility code (functions point-at-eol, point-at-bol)
* Added function description for svn-status-mode (suggestion from Isaac Jones)
* Some fixes in function svn-status-line-info->hide-because-unmodified

author: blair
msg: * tools/client-side/svn_load_dirs.pl:
Use /usr/bin/perl instead of /opt/i386-linux/perl/bin/perl to run
the script.  Requested by Brandon Ehle <azverkan@yahoo.com>.
